verses.verse: In that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall this <S%H7892>song<s%> be <S%H7891>sung<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; We have a <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>; <S%H3444>salvation<s%> will God <S%H7896>appoint<s%> for <S%H2346>walls<s%> and <S%H2426>bulwarks<s%>.
<S%H6605>Open<s%> ye the <S%H8179>gates<s%>, that the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> which <S%H8104>keepeth<s%> the <S%H529>truth<s%> may enter <S%H935>in<s%>.
Thou wilt <S%H5341>keep<s%> him in <S%H7965>perfect<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%>, whose <S%H3336>mind<s%> is <S%H5564>stayed<s%> on thee: because he <S%H982>trusteth<s%> in thee.
<S%H982>Trust<s%> ye in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>: for in the <S%H3050>LORD<s%> <S%H3068>JEHOVAH<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H6697>strength<s%>:

¶ For he bringeth <S%H7817>down<s%> them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> on <S%H4791>high<s%>; the <S%H7682>lofty<s%> <S%H7151>city<s%>, he layeth it <S%H8213>low<s%>; he layeth it <S%H8213>low<s%>, even to the <S%H776>ground<s%>; he <S%H5060>bringeth<s%> it even to the <S%H6083>dust<s%>.
The <S%H7272>foot<s%> shall tread it <S%H7429>down<s%>, even the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor<s%>, and the <S%H6471>steps<s%> of the <S%H1800>needy<s%>.
The <S%H734>way<s%> of the <S%H6662>just<s%> is <S%H4339>uprightness<s%>: thou, most <S%H3477>upright<s%>, dost <S%H6424>weigh<s%> the <S%H4570>path<s%> of the <S%H6662>just<s%>.

Yea, in the <S%H734>way<s%> of thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, have we <S%H6960>waited<s%> for thee; the <S%H8378>desire<s%> of our <S%H5315>soul<s%> is to thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, and to the <S%H2143>remembrance<s%> of thee.

With my <S%H5315>soul<s%> have I <S%H183>desired<s%> thee in the <S%H3915>night<s%>; yea, with my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> me will I seek thee <S%H7836>early<s%>: for when thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are in the <S%H776>earth<s%>, the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> will <S%H3925>learn<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>.

Let favour be <S%H2603>shewed<s%> to the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, yet will he <S%H1077>not<s%> <S%H3925>learn<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>: in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5229>uprightness<s%> will he deal <S%H5765>unjustly<s%>, and will <S%H1077>not<s%> <S%H7200>behold<s%> the <S%H1348>majesty<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

<S%H3068>LORD<s%>, when thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> is lifted <S%H7311>up<s%>, they will not <S%H2372>see<s%>: but they shall <S%H2372>see<s%>, and be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> for their <S%H7068>envy<s%> at the <S%H5971>people<s%>; yea, the <S%H784>fire<s%> of thine <S%H6862>enemies<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> them.
¶ <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, thou wilt <S%H8239>ordain<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> for us: for thou also hast <S%H6466>wrought<s%> all our <S%H4639>works<s%> in us.

O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, other <S%H113>lords<s%> <S%H2108>beside<s%> thee have had <S%H1166>dominion<s%> over us: but by thee only will we make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of thy <S%H8034>name<s%>.

They are <S%H4191>dead<s%>, they shall not <S%H2421>live<s%>; they are <S%H7496>deceased<s%>, they shall not <S%H6965>rise<s%>: therefore hast thou <S%H6485>visited<s%> and <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them, and made all their <S%H2143>memory<s%> to <S%H6>perish<s%>.

Thou hast <S%H3254>increased<s%> the <S%H1471>nation<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, thou hast <S%H3254>increased<s%> the <S%H1471>nation<s%>: thou art <S%H3513>glorified<s%>: thou hadst removed it <S%H7368>far<s%> unto all the <S%H7099>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
<S%H3068>LORD<s%>, in <S%H6862>trouble<s%> have they <S%H6485>visited<s%> thee, they poured <S%H6694>out<s%> a <S%H3908>prayer<s%> when thy <S%H4148>chastening<s%> was upon them.

<S%H3644>Like<s%> as a woman with <S%H2030>child<s%>, that draweth <S%H7126>near<s%> the time of her <S%H3205>delivery<s%>, is in <S%H2342>pain<s%>, and crieth <S%H2199>out<s%> in her <S%H2256>pangs<s%>; so have we been in thy <S%H6440>sight<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

We have been with <S%H2029>child<s%>, we have been in <S%H2342>pain<s%>, we have as it <S%H3644>were<s%> brought <S%H3205>forth<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%>; we have not <S%H6213>wrought<s%> any <S%H3444>deliverance<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>; <S%H1077>neither<s%> have the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%>.

Thy <S%H4191>dead<s%> men shall <S%H2421>live<s%>, together with my dead <S%H5038>body<s%> shall they <S%H6965>arise<s%>. <S%H6974>Awake<s%> and <S%H7442>sing<s%>, ye that <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in <S%H6083>dust<s%>: for thy <S%H2919>dew<s%> is as the <S%H2919>dew<s%> of <S%H219>herbs<s%>, and the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall cast <S%H5307>out<s%> the <S%H7496>dead<s%>.

¶ <S%H3212>Come<s%>, my <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H935>enter<s%> thou into thy <S%H2315>chambers<s%>, and <S%H5462>shut<s%> thy <S%H1817>doors<s%> about thee: <S%H2247>hide<s%> thyself as it were for a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H7281>moment<s%>, until the <S%H2195>indignation<s%> be <S%H5674>overpast<s%>.

For, behold, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> cometh <S%H3318>out<s%> of his <S%H4725>place<s%> to <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> for their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>: the <S%H776>earth<s%> also shall <S%H1540>disclose<s%> her <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and shall no more <S%H3680>cover<s%> her <S%H2026>slain<s%>.
